gobblin.runtime

Class AbstractTaskStateTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.AbstractTaskStateTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, TaskStateTracker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalTaskStateTracker, MRTaskStateTracker

    public abstract class AbstractTaskStateTracker
extends AbstractIdleService
implements TaskStateTracker
    An abstract implementation of TaskStateTracker that provides basic common functionality for platform-specific implementations.
